Features.title: InsightEats Features
Features.description: Discover how InsightEats helps you take control of your nutrition with intelligent tracking and personalized insights.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At InsightEats, we believe that sustainable health begins with awareness. Our goal is to make nutrition tracking effortless, accurate, and enjoyable, empowering you to make informed decisions about your diet and achieve your health goals with confidence.

smartTracking.title: Smart Tracking
smartTracking.description: Log your meals quickly with our intelligent food search that connects to global databases including Open Food Facts and USDA.

detailedInsights.title: Detailed Insights
detailedInsights.description: Track your calories, macros, and weight over time with beautiful charts and progress indicators.

globalDatabase.title: Global Database
globalDatabase.description: Access thousands of verified foods from trusted sources worldwide, ensuring accurate nutritional information.

quickEasy.title: Quick & Easy
quickEasy.description: Designed for simplicity, our app makes logging meals fast so you can focus on what matters most.

technologies.title: Built with Modern Technology
technologies.description: InsightEats is built using the latest web technologies to ensure a fast, secure, and reliable experience.
